title: Adele and Simon Konecki's love story as she confirms she's secretly MARRIED
text:
Adele and Simon Konecki's love story as she confirms she's secretly MARRIED The singer thanked her "husband" in an epic Grammys acceptance speech   Adele lets slip that she DOES have a husband during acceptance speech   
Adele caused plenty of stir at the 2017 Grammy Awards - not least for blurting out her love for Beyonce in an emotional speech, demanding her performance of Fast Love be restarted after hearing she was out of tune, or for accidentally breaking her award in half during a press call. 
But that wasn't all. 
The 28-year-old singer managed to score five awards in total and during one of her acceptance speeches, she appeared to confirm that she HAS secretly married her long-term partner Simon Konecki. 
Previously, Adele sparked rumours that she had tied the knot in December 2016 when she was spotted wearing a gold band on her ring finger while out shopping in Beverly Hills. Adele and Simon kiss at the Grammys (Photo: Recording Academy/ Grammys /Youtube)   
Some of the singer's followers rushed to Twitter to share their excitement, with one saying: "Ok look at her hand... It's a f***ing wedding band! You can argue with me but still." 
Adele and Simon, who share four-year-old son Angelo together, have been together for over five years and got engaged in October last year. But who is he? Let's find out... Who is Adele's husband Simon Konecki? 
Simon is the 43-year-old CEO of drop4drop, the charity that helps supply clean water to developing countries. He's also the brains behind Life water, which donates to his charity. He was previously a investment banker but left because he felt sickened by the gap between rich and poor people. 
He was previously married to fashion stylist Clary Fisher and had a daughter with her in 2007. They later separated and divorced. When did Adele and Simon start dating? Adele and then-boyfriend Simon were seen leaving Sid Owen's birthday party in February 2012 (Photo: GoffPhoto) 
The two were spotted together for the first time in public in January 2012, when they were holidaying together in Florida's Everglades. It's thought the couple were brought together by their shared passion for charity work. 
There were reports at the time they started dating that Simon was still married when he met Adele, but the singer later confirmed in her blog that he'd been divorced for four years by the time they started a relationship. Who is Adele's son? They posed for pictures together in December 2013, 14 months after the birth of Angelo 
Little Angelo James Konecki was born on October 19 2012, just eight months after Adele and Simon were reported to be a couple. Adele later opened up about having post-natal depression, saying she was "obsessed" with her baby and felt like an inadequate mother to him. She went on to reveal that her solution was to have one afternoon a week completely to herself, as that helped her feel more grounded. 
In her acceptance speech at the 2017 Grammy Awards, after winning a gong for Best Album, Adele admitted having a child had made her forget a part of herself. 
"Five years ago when I was last here, I was pregnant and I didn't know. I found out shortly after, and it was the biggest blessing of my life. 
"And in my pregnancy and through becoming a mother I lost a lot of myself. And I've struggled – I still do struggle being a mum, it's really hard. But tonight winning this kind of feels full circle and like I've come back to myself." Is Adele married? 
There was speculation towards the end of 2016 that Simon and Adele had tied the knot, but neither of them publicly confirmed the news despite numerous reports. However, at the Grammy Awards in February 2017, Adele gave the game away by thanking Simon in her acceptance speech. 
"The Academy I love you, my manager, my husband, my son – you're the only reason I do it. Thank you so much to everybody," she said. Adele thanked her "husband" during her Grammys acceptance speech (Photo: REUTERS) She revealed that being a mother was "really hard", but winning Album of the Year had brought her back to herself   Like us on Facebook
